title: Looking for 3 players to join clash. Pref ADC, MID, SUPPORT or JG. Silver+
body:
EDIT: Due to overwhelming response, we currently have 3 pending invites. 2 extra's who will we substitute if the others don't accept.  I will update this post if we have/haven't gotten a full team to let all future readers of this post if we need anymore people. 

I'd like to say thank you for taking your time participating in this thread!


EDIT2: You will receive an invite from "UNFORTUANTELY", he is our team captain and is handling the invites. Rest assured, this is the correct team I am in as well.

~~So, ugh, well.... Shit happens and our players went MIA. I'd still like to participate in clash but we are 3 short. I am expandable and so is my friend, we can play any role except for support (meme role). 

We are playing for fun (obviously we are gonna try to win) but if we lose, it's alright, we had our fun.  So if anyone wants to join, please add me and msg me afterwards. 

We are looking for sportsmanlike people who are friendly and aren't toxic. That's all we ask. No trollers, no inters and anything remotely close to griefing, please.~~

replies.body: I am top main if you are interested

I think someone else already got jg, sorry. However, we have in theory 4 people now. We need only a support now, if you'd like to? 

I'm pretty sure they will ban pyke though.
Add me, I can ADC, Gold 5, Aspergers (in game at the moment)
